column3: knowing we wanted to split a 9 inch traditionally sausage and cheese pie
column4: we ordered a house salad to split. Out of nowhere
column5: this salad came from left field
column6: what with it's slightly sweet dressing and it's blue cheese crumbles and veggies. It was SO good. We split the salad. Now I must say the waiter warned us before hand of the wait time
column8: I don't know another food you need to order so damn far in advance at a restaurant. haha.
